name: SemanticSpace Technologies
overview: SemanticSpace Technologies Limited provides enterprise project services, assurance services, and software products to enterprises in the United States and internationally. The companyâ€™s products include Project and Portfolio Management tool, which helps organizations in managing projects from inception to delivery by providing automated reporting of project status and visibility of project metrics in the application lifecycle; Microsoft Dynamics ERP, an enterprise solution for mid-market enterprise businesses that provides integrated solutions for various management functions; and Oracle’s e-business suite, an integration solution in financials, distribution, and manufacturing areas. It also offers application development, application maintenance, application re-engineering, outsourced product development, software QA and testing, and technology migration services, as well as provides ERP implementation services, such as installation, configuration, and customization of MSD, Oracle, and SAP software. The company serves banking and financial services, insurance, healthcare, retail, media and entertainment, technology, manufacturing, construction, and energy industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Irvine, California. It has sales offices in Atlanta; Texas; London, the United Kingdom; and Hamburg, Germany, as well as development centers in Hyderabad, India. The company has subsidiaries in Santa Clara, California; and New York, New York.
